creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photo-collage of a typewriter in a mountain field, printed in offset lithography on coated paper covers; 44 pp.
inscription: Inside of Front cover, black ink pen: hi fly / read this / in a quiet / yet fizzy / mood / and / keep / writing / lv / Dick / (doodle)
medium: Offset lithography, letterpress, decal; bound volume
title: Write The Way Up
